text: [Music]
I don't know what doing hi guys in this
video I will show you how to make an ice
core a future base track but you may ask
Robert what is core a future base
basically you will need to combine
future base with some anime music and
that's it open Excel studio and get a
sexy wallpaper then we will start
creating a cute melody I always like to
start with the chords open any piano VST
and start with the bass
[Music]
then try to find some notes that sound
good with the bass and then stack the
notes
[Music]
[Music]
also don't forget to change the tempo to
150 BPM so the top melody you will need
to create something sweet and catchy
[Music]
then add some variation using the 1/3
step
[Music]
now we can start to stack the presets
for the top melody I used just one
simple sound don't forget to have some
portamento for the processing I added
fruity parametric EQ to fabfilter saturn
some reverb and sidechain if you want to
learn how to use all these plugins you
can check out my new platform called
music hero also the Ceph LP will be
available only for the members of music
arrow and the best part of this platform
is that you can talk with other music
producers and collaborate with them
because I know how hard it is to find
some friends that are interested in
producing music make sure to check out
the first link in the description for
more details for the chords I combined
some organic elements with some sets
[Music]
[Music]
for the processing I used fabfilter
pro-q three-two cup some of the bad
frequencies fabfilter saturn to add some
saturation our imager to make the chords
a little bit wider a compressor and some
sidechain now let's move on to the base
line the base line actually has a lot of
energy because of the notes instead of
using a straight base I decided to
create this marshmallow vibe
[Music]
[Music]
and don't forget to add a fat sub base
like this now I will show you how to
make a kawaii beat first you will need
to start with a kick
then add some snares and percussions I
also change the beats for the second
drop the drop is ready but we will need
to create a breakdown in to build up for
the breakdown I kept the same chord
progression but I changed the sounds
I also created this melody and I added
some Martin garrix chords don't forget
to add the bassline
[Music]
to the build up I have a drop melody
with some drums and effects and that's
it
[Applause]
